questions.question_text: Which type of role can be granted to a share?
When unloading data with the COPY INTO [location] command, what is the purpose of the PARTITION BY parameter option?

choices.C: To include a new column in the output using the specified window function expression.
choices.D: To split the output into multiple files, one for each distinct value of the specified expression.
choices.A: To sort the contents of the output file by the specified expression.
choices.B: To delimit the records in the output file using the specified expression.

choices.A: Faster query performance and increased storage consumption
choices.C: Faster query performance and decreased storage consumption
choices.D: Slower query performance and decreased storage consumption
choices.B: Slower query performance and increased storage consumption

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Non-native values such as dates and timestamps are stored as strings when loaded into a VARIANT column, so operations on these values could be slower and also consume more space than when stored in a relational column with the corresponding data type.

questions.question_text: What are potential impacts of storing non-native values like dates and timestamps in a VARIANT column in Snowflake?
Which of the following statements is true of Snowflake micro-partitioning?

choices.C: Micro-partitioning is transparently completed using the ordering that occurs when the data is inserted/loaded
choices.B: Micro-partitioning: requires a partitioning schema to be defined up front
choices.D: Micro-partitioning can be disabled within a Snowflake account
choices.A: Micro-partitioning has been known to introduce data skew

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C is correct

Selected Answer: C
Option C is correct

Selected Answer: E
It is D and E

Correct Answers: D. MONETIZED_USAGE_DAILY and E. LISTING_TELEMETRY_DAILY
MONETIZED_USAGE_DAILY: This view provides daily usage data for monetized data sharing, which is relevant for tracking and analyzing how shared data is being accessed and utilized in a monetized context.
LISTING_TELEMETRY_DAILY: This view contains daily telemetry data for data listings, offering insights into the activity and interactions with data listings shared via Snowflake.

Selected Answer: D
It's D & E
